TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TaskLoggingHelper extends System.MarshalByRefObject

summary.span: 提供任务使用的帮助器日志记录方法。

span.span: Provides helper logging methods used by tasks.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示创建一个或多个目录的任务的代码。The following example shows the code for a task that creates one or more directories. [!code-csharp[msbuild_MakeDirTask#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/msbuild_MakeDirTask/CS/msbuild_MakeDirTask.cs#1)]

span.span: The task containing an instance of this task.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and associates it with the specified task instance.

MemberSignature.Value: public string ExtractMessageCode (string message, out string messageWithoutCodePrefix);
.method public hidebysig instance string ExtractMessageCode(string message, [out] string& messageWithoutCodePrefix) cil managed
Public Function ExtractMessageCode (message As String, ByRef messageWithoutCodePrefix As String) As String
public: System::String ^ ExtractMessageCode(System::String ^ message, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % messageWithoutCodePrefix);

param.name: message
param.span: 要分析的完整消息，包括代码前缀。

span.span: The full message to parse that includes code prefix.

param.name: messageWithoutCodePrefix
param.span: 已删除消息（包括代码前缀）。

span.span: The message with the code prefix removed.

summary.span: 从给定的完整消息字符串中提取消息代码前缀。

span.span: Extracts the message code prefix from the given full message string.

returns.span: 从完整的消息字符串中提取的消息代码前缀，或如果没有消息代码，则为 。

span.span: The message code prefix that is extracted from the full message string, or if there is no message code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息代码前缀必须与以下.NET 正则表达式匹配以便识别： `^\s*[A-Za-z]+\d+:\s*`。Message code prefixes must match the following .NET regular expressions in order to be recognized: `^\s*[A-Za-z]+\d+:\s*`. ## Examples 如果此方法未提供完整的消息字符串`MYTASK1001: This is an error message.`和它接受`This is an error message.`的值作为`messageWithoutCodePrefix`参数，则其返回`MYTASK1001`。If this method is given the full message string `MYTASK1001: This is an error message.` and it accepts `This is an error message.` as the value for the `messageWithoutCodePrefix` parameter, then it returns `MYTASK1001`.

span.span: is .

summary.span: 加载指定的资源字符串，并可以使用给定自变量对其进行格式设置。

span.span: Loads the specified resource string and optionally formats it using the given arguments.
The formatted string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前线程的区域性用于格式设置。The culture of the current thread is used for formatting. 此方法要求使用已注册其资源的所有者任务基类构造函数，或属性。This method requires the owner task to have registered its resources with either the base class constructor, or the property.

exception.span: 所指示的字符串资源不存在。

span.span: The string resource indicated by does not exist.

exception.span: 未设置所有者任务的 属性。

span.span: The property of the owner task is not set.
is .

MemberSignature.Value: public string HelpKeywordPrefix { get; set; }
.property instance string HelpKeywordPrefix
Public Property HelpKeywordPrefix As String
public: property System::String ^ HelpKeywordPrefix { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置前缀，此前缀用于通过资源名称组成 Help 关键字。

span.span: Gets or sets the prefix used to compose Help keywords from resource names.

value.span: 用于通过资源名称组成 Help 关键字的前缀。

span.span: The prefix used to compose Help keywords from resource names.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果任务不具有与其消息关联的 Help 关键字，则它可以忽略此属性或将其设置为`null`。If a task does not have Help keywords associated with its messages, it can ignore this property or set it to `null`. 如果此属性设置为一个空，将按原义 Help 关键字用作使用资源名称。If this property is set to an empty , resource names will be used verbatim as Help keywords.

MemberSignature.Value: public override object InitializeLifetimeService ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance object InitializeLifetimeService() cil managed
Public Overrides Function InitializeLifetimeService () As Object
public: override System::Object ^ InitializeLifetimeService();

summary.span: 远程控制对象被激活时，调用 InitializeLifetimeService。

span.span: InitializeLifetimeService is called when the remote object is activated.

summary.span: 此方法将确定该对象的生存期。

span.span: This method will determine how long the lifetime for the object will be.

summary.span: 线程安全。

span.span: Thread safe.

summary.span: 但是，InitializeLifetimeService 和 MarkAsInactive 仅以此顺序，两者一起或不一起并且不超过一次进行调用。

span.span: However, InitializeLifetimeService and MarkAsInactive should only be called in that order, together or not at all, and no more than once.

returns.span: 控制该对象生存期的租用对象。

span.span: The lease object to control this object's lifetime.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数`subCategoryResourceName`， `errorCode`， `helpKeyword`，和`file`可以是`null`。The parameters `subCategoryResourceName`, `errorCode`, `helpKeyword`, and `file` can be `null`. 参数`lineNumber`， `columnNumber`， `endLineNumber`，和`endColumnNumber`应设置为 0，如果这些选项不可用。The parameters `lineNumber`, `columnNumber`, `endLineNumber`, and `endColumnNumber` should be set to 0 if they are not available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果消息开始，错误代码，则提取并消息一起记录代码。If the message begins with an error code, the code is extracted and logged with the message. 如果已提供的帮助关键字前缀，它还消息一起记录。If a Help keyword prefix has been provided, it is also logged with the message. 通过将字符串资源名称追加到帮助关键字前缀由组成帮助关键字。The Help keyword is composed by appending the string resource name to the Help keyword prefix. 任务可以提供帮助关键字前缀使用基类构造函数，或属性。A task can provide a Help keyword prefix with either the base class constructor, or the property.

span.span: is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数`subCategoryResourceName`， `warningCode`， `helpKeyword`，和`file`可以是`null`。The parameters `subCategoryResourceName`, `warningCode`, `helpKeyword`, and `file` can be `null`. 参数`lineNumber`， `columnNumber`， `endLineNumber`，和`endColumnNumber`应设置为 0，如果这些选项不可用。The parameters `lineNumber`, `columnNumber`, `endLineNumber`, and `endColumnNumber` should be set to 0 if they are not available.

span.span: Logs a warning with a warning code using the specified resource string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果消息具有警告代码的开始，该代码是提取并消息一起记录。If the message begins with a warning code, the code is extracted and logged with the message. 如果已提供的帮助关键字前缀，它还消息一起记录。If a Help keyword prefix has been provided, it is also logged with the message. 通过将字符串资源名称追加到帮助关键字前缀由组成帮助关键字。The Help keyword is composed by appending the string resource name to the Help keyword prefix. 任务可以提供帮助关键字前缀使用基类构造函数，或属性。A task can provide a Help keyword prefix with either the base class constructor, or the property.

span.span: is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果消息具有警告代码的开始，该代码是提取并消息一起记录。If the message begins with a warning code, the code is extracted and logged with the message. 如果已提供的帮助关键字前缀，它还消息一起记录。If a Help keyword prefix has been provided, it is also logged with the message. 通过将字符串资源名称追加到帮助关键字前缀由组成帮助关键字。The Help keyword is composed by appending the string resource name to the Help keyword prefix. 任务可以提供帮助关键字前缀使用基类构造函数，或属性。A task can provide a Help keyword prefix with either the base class constructor, or the property. 参数`subCategoryResourceName`，和`file`可以是`null`。The parameters `subCategoryResourceName`, and `file` can be `null`. 参数`lineNumber`， `columnNumber`， `endLineNumber`，和`endColumnNumber`应设置为 0，如果这些选项不可用。The parameters `lineNumber`, `columnNumber`, `endLineNumber`, and `endColumnNumber` should be set to 0 if they are not available.

MemberSignature.Value: public void MarkAsInactive ();
.method public hidebysig instance void MarkAsInactive() cil managed
Public Sub MarkAsInactive ()
public: void MarkAsInactive();

summary.span: 通知此 它不再被需要。

span.span: Notifies this that it is no longer needed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是线程安全，但是，你必须按此顺序调用 InitializeLifetimeService 和 MarkAsInactive，或必须调用这两种方法，并且必须调用一次这两种方法。This method is thread safe, however, you must call both InitializeLifetimeService and MarkAsInactive, in that order, or you must call neither method, and you must call neither method than once.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果派生的类具有本地化字符串，然后应该使用此属性注册其资源。If derived classes have localized strings, then they should register their resources with this property.
